name: A Buggy Imagination
description:
This game was made for the Wowie jam 2.0 in 72 hours.

In some levels if you take too much time the level becomes impossible. If this happens to you remember you can press R to restart the level.

Credits:

For this jam we worked in a team of 2 people: 

Polarcube1- 
-Art
-Music
-SoundEffects
-Little Bit Of Code

Dark Blue Dragon Games-
-Lots Of Coding
-UI

Disclaimers:

We have build support for Mac and Linux but we did not test them.
